bestIdea.name: The Frosty Path to Narnia
bestIdea.description: Embark on a magical journey through the snow-laden landscapes of Narnia, where the White Witch's eternal winter reigns. Traverse through enchanted forests, past frozen lakes, and over icy mountains, discovering the hidden wonders and mystical creatures that inhabit this winter fantasy realm.

otherIdeas.name: The Winter Road to Arendelle
otherIdeas.description: Journey through the icy landscapes of Arendelle, inspired by the world of Frozen. Traverse snow-covered mountains, cross frozen fjords, and explore the magical kingdom where Elsa and Anna's adventures unfold.

possibleSteps.endingLocation: The Valley of the Living Rock

otherIdeas.name: The Snowy Quest to Winterfell
otherIdeas.description: Venture through the harsh, snow-covered lands of the North in Westeros, from the Wall to the ancestral home of House Stark, Winterfell. Experience the chilling beauty and the ancient power that lies within this winter fantasy setting.

otherIdeas.name: The Icy Pilgrimage to the North Pole
otherIdeas.description: Embark on a real-world expedition to the North Pole, traversing the vast, frozen Arctic landscapes. Experience the extreme cold, the endless ice, and the breathtaking beauty of the polar environment.
